summary: Feature request to implement environment configuration support in the PHP SDK, following the external client configuration proposal and features issue #441.
userImpact: Enables developers to configure Temporal clients through environment variables, improving deployment flexibility and consistency across SDKs.
proposedFix: Implement environment configuration following the external-client-configuration proposal for consistent cross-SDK behavior.
resolutionDetails: Feature implemented to support environment-based client configuration in PHP SDK.
